node.html: The ReInHerit’s Handbook thematic priorities are founded on effective communication and collaboration within the diverse European cultural heritage sector, built upon three central pillars, on which the objectives of the Handbook are anchored: digitization, sustainability, and continuing professional development.

frontmatter.title: Handbook On Communication and Collaboration in Museums and Heritage Sites
